trans-unit.source: Provides interaction with Windows event logs.
trans-unit.target: 提供與 Windows 事件記錄檔的互動。

trans-unit.source: EventLog lets you access or customize Windows event logs, which record information about important software or hardware events.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔可讓您存取或自訂 Windows 事件記錄檔，它會記錄重要的軟體或硬體事件的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Using EventLog, you can read from existing logs, write entries to logs, create or delete event sources, delete logs, and respond to log entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件記錄檔，您可以從現有的記錄檔讀取、 寫入記錄檔中的項目，建立或刪除事件來源、 刪除記錄檔，以及回應記錄項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also create new logs when creating an event source.
trans-unit.target: 建立事件來源時，您也可以建立新的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個型別實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: In addition to providing access to individual event logs and their entries, the EventLog class lets you access the collection of all event logs.
trans-unit.target: 除了提供個別的事件記錄檔和其項目存取權，EventLog 類別可讓您存取的所有事件記錄檔集合。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `static` members of EventLog to delete logs, get log lists, create or delete a source, or determine if a computer already contains a particular source.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用`static`成員的事件記錄檔來刪除記錄檔，取得記錄清單、 建立或刪除來源，或判斷電腦是否已包含特定的來源。

trans-unit.source: There are three default event logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 有三個預設事件記錄檔︰ 應用程式、 系統及安全性。

trans-unit.source: A Security log is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 安全性記錄檔為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: Other applications and services you install, such as Active Directory, might have additional event logs.
trans-unit.target: 其他應用程式和服務安裝，例如 Active Directory 中，可能會有額外的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: There are security considerations when using the EventLog class.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件記錄檔類別時，有一些安全性考量。

trans-unit.source: EventLog requires <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission> permissions for specific actions in the .NET Framework 2.0 and later versions, or full trust in the .NET Framework 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔需要<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>的.NET Framework 2.0 和更新版本中中的特定動作或.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中的完全信任權限。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>

trans-unit.source: We recommend that <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission> not be granted to partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議最好讓<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>授與部分信任程式碼。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermission>

trans-unit.source: You should never pass any event log object, including <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> objects, to less trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 您應該永遠不會傳遞任何事件記錄檔物件，包括<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>較不受信任的程式碼的物件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, creating an EventLog object, writing an entry, and then passing the EventLog object to partially trusted code can create a security issue, because the ability to read and write to the event log allows code to perform actions such as issuing event log messages in the name of another application.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，建立 EventLog 物件、 撰寫一個項目，然後再將傳遞的事件記錄檔以部分信任程式碼的物件可以建立安全性問題，因為能夠讀取和寫入事件記錄檔可讓程式碼來執行動作，例如發出事件記錄檔訊息，另一個應用程式的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the credentials of a user.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建的 Administrators 群組的成員，您就會指派兩個執行階段存取語彙基元︰ 標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To run the code that accesses the Security log, you must first elevate your credentials from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼存取安全性記錄檔，您必須先將您的認證從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by opening the shortcut menu for the application (if you're using a mouse, right-click the application icon) and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 您可以開啟應用程式的捷徑功能表啟動應用程式時 （如果您使用滑鼠，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示），並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行。

trans-unit.source: You can use EventLog to create custom event logs that you can view through the server's Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立自訂的事件記錄檔，您可以透過伺服器的事件檢視器檢視，您可以使用事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A> method to display a localized name for your event log in the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A>方法，以顯示事件檢視器中的事件記錄檔的當地語系化的名稱。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.RegisterDisplayName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> method to configure the behavior of your event log when it reaches its maximum log size.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>方法以設定事件記錄檔的行為，當它在達到最大記錄檔大小。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: To read from an event log, specify the log name (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property) and server computer name (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 若要從事件記錄檔讀取，指定記錄檔名稱 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性) 和伺服器電腦名稱 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>事件記錄檔的屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you don't specify the server computer name, the local computer, ".", is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定伺服器的電腦名稱，在本機電腦 」。 」，會假設。

trans-unit.source: It's not necessary to specify the event source (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property), because a source is required only for writing to logs.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定事件來源 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性)，因為來源是只有需要寫入記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> property is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>屬性會自動填入的項目事件記錄檔的清單。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>

trans-unit.source: To write to an event log, specify or create an event source (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 若要寫入事件記錄檔，指定或建立事件來源 (<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理認證。

trans-unit.source: The event source registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源使用，註冊您的應用程式事件記錄檔項目的有效來源。

trans-unit.source: You can use the event source to write to only one log at a time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用事件來源寫入一次只能有一個記錄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property can be any random string, but the name must be distinct from other sources on the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性可以是隨機的任何字串，但必須是相異的電腦上的其他來源的名稱。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event source is typically the name of the application or another identifying string.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源通常是應用程式或另一個的識別字串的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Trying to create a duplicate <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> value throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試建立重複<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>值擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, a single event log can be associated with multiple sources.
trans-unit.target: 不過，單一的事件記錄檔可以與多個來源產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: If the event source for the event log associated with the EventLog instance doesn't exist, a new event source is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源的事件記錄檔執行個體相關聯的事件記錄檔不存在，則會建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: To create an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative credentials.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立事件來源在 Windows Vista 和更新版本或 Windows Server 2003，您必須具有系統管理認證。

trans-unit.source: This requirement is because all event logs, including Security logs, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為必須搜尋所有的事件記錄檔，包括安全性記錄檔，以判斷事件來源是否為唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the Security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者沒有權限來存取安全性記錄檔中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Creating or deleting an event source requires synchronization of the underlying code by using a named mutex.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 建立或刪除事件來源，需要同步處理的基礎程式碼使用具名的 mutex。

trans-unit.source: If a highly privileged application locks the named mutex, trying to create or delete an event source causes the application to stop responding until the lock is released.
trans-unit.target: 如果高特殊權限的應用程式鎖定具名的 mutex，嘗試建立或刪除事件來源會導致應用程式停止回應，直到釋放鎖定為止。

trans-unit.source: To help prevent this problem, never grant <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> permission to untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，永遠不會授與<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>不受信任的程式碼的權限。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>

trans-unit.source: In addition, <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag> permission potentially allows other permissions to be bypassed and should only be granted to highly trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>權限可能會允許略過其他使用權限，以及應該只授與高度信任的程式碼。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag>

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or to a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property, the event log defaults to the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有明確設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性，應用程式記錄檔的事件記錄檔預設值</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is nothing to protect an application from writing as any registered source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 沒有要保護應用程式做為任何已註冊的來源寫入項目。

trans-unit.source: If an application is granted <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess> permission, it can write events for any valid source registered on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式授與<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess>權限，它可以寫入事件的任何有效的來源電腦上註冊。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogPermissionAccess>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> methods to write events to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>寫入事件記錄檔事件的方法</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定事件來源寫入事件。您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system hasn't refreshed its list of event sources, and you try to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統沒有重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試要寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source by using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> object or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用設定新的來源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>物件或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative credentials on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理認證。

trans-unit.source: Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個事件記錄檔可以寫入每個來源一次。不過，您的應用程式可以使用多個來源來寫入多個事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔案。

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更現有來源的設定詳細資料，您必須刪除來源，並再建立使用新的設定。

trans-unit.source: If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration instead of deleting the existing source.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他應用程式或元件使用現有的來源，建立新的來源與更新的組態，而不是刪除現有的來源。

trans-unit.source: You can register the event source with localized resources for your event category and message strings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以向事件來源的當地語系化資源的事件類別目錄和訊息字串。

trans-unit.source: Your application can write event log entries by using resource identifiers instead of specifying the actual string values.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式可以使用資源識別項，而不是指定實際的字串值寫入事件記錄檔項目。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> classes for more information about configuring your source with resource files.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>設定您的來源的資源檔的相關資訊的類別。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes string values directly to the event log, you do not have to set the resource file properties for the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式會將字串值，直接寫入事件記錄檔，您不必設定資源的來源檔案內容。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: When writing events, you must at least specify either a message string or the resource identifier for a message string.
trans-unit.target: 當寫入事件時，至少必須指定訊息字串或訊息字串的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: Other event properties are optional.
trans-unit.target: 其他屬性是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: Examples of optional event settings include the following: - You can set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的事件設定的範例包括下列:-您可以設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>指定 事件檢視器顯示之項目的圖示。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>

trans-unit.source: - You can specify a category identifier for the event, if your application uses categories for filtering the events.
trans-unit.target: -您可以指定事件的類別識別項，如果您的應用程式使用類別來進行篩選的事件。

trans-unit.source: - You can attach binary data to your event entry if you want to associate additional information with a given event.
trans-unit.target: -您可以將二進位資料附加到事件的項目，如果您想要與指定的事件產生關聯的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Event logging consumes disk space, processor time, and other system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件記錄會耗用磁碟空間、 處理器時間，以及其他系統資源。

trans-unit.source: It is important to log only essential information.
trans-unit.target: 請務必記錄重要的資訊。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you place event log calls in an error path, rather than in the main code path, so they don't adversely affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您將事件記錄檔呼叫放在錯誤路徑，而不是主要的程式碼的路徑中，因此它們不效能產生負面影響。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of EventLog, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需事件記錄檔的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: If you are only reading <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> from the log, you can alternatively specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> properties.

trans-unit.target: 將執行個體與指定的電腦上的記錄檔產生關聯，並建立或指派至指定的來源<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property to the `logName` parameter, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property to the `machineName` parameter, and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property to the `source` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性`logName`參數，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>屬性`machineName`參數，而<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性`source`參數。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property is required when writing to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性時，需要寫入事件記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you are only reading from an event log, only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> properties are required (as long as the event log on the server has a source already associated with it).
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您只讀取事件記錄檔，只<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>（只要伺服器事件記錄檔包含已與它相關聯的來源），都需要屬性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you are only reading from the event log, another overload of the constructor might suffice.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只讀取事件記錄檔，另一個多載建構函式可能會就夠了。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 初始化發生於執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component used on a form or by another component.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]設計環境會使用這個方法來開始初始化用於表單或另一個元件所使用的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A>方法結束初始化。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A> methods prevent the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用 BeginInit 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A>方法會防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> is already initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>已初始化。

trans-unit.source: Removes all entries from the event log.
trans-unit.target: 從事件記錄檔中移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: Event logs are set with a maximum size that determines how many entries they can contain.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔會以判斷它們可以包含的項目數量的大小上限設定。

trans-unit.source: When an event log is full, it stops recording new event information or begins to overwrite earlier entries.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔已滿時，它會停止記錄新事件的資訊，或開始覆寫先前項目。

trans-unit.source: If event recording stops, you can use this method to clear the log of existing entries and allow it to start recording events again.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件錄製隨即停止，您可以使用這個方法來清除現有的項目記錄，讓它再次啟動錄製事件。

trans-unit.source: You must have administrator permissions to the computer on which the log resides to clear event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 您必須擁有清除事件記錄檔項目記錄檔所在電腦的系統管理員權限。

trans-unit.source: Clear closes the event log, releases the event handles, retrieves new read and write handles, and reopens the event log.
trans-unit.target: 清除關閉事件記錄檔，釋出事件控制代碼，擷取新的讀取和寫入控制代碼，並重新開啟事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Events received after the call to the method are not cleared along with the existing events.
trans-unit.target: 在方法呼叫之後收到的事件不會清除和現有的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event log was not cleared successfully.
trans-unit.target: 未成功清除事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: -or- The log cannot be opened.
trans-unit.target: -或者-無法開啟記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Windows 錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A value is not specified for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*> property.
trans-unit.target: 如未指定值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*>屬性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*>

trans-unit.source: Make sure the log name is not an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 請確定記錄檔名稱不是空字串。

trans-unit.source: The log does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 記錄檔不存在。

trans-unit.source: Closes the event log and releases read and write handles.
trans-unit.target: 關閉事件記錄檔並釋放讀取和寫入控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The Close method is called by the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Close 方法會呼叫受保護的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to invoke Close before calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要在之前呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>叫用關閉

trans-unit.source: The event log's read handle or write handle was not released successfully.
trans-unit.target: 未成功釋放事件記錄檔讀取的控制代碼或寫入控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a valid event source for writing localized event messages, using the specified configuration properties for the event source and the corresponding event log.
trans-unit.target: 建立有效的事件來源的撰寫當地語系化的事件訊息，使用指定的組態屬性的事件來源和對應的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The configuration properties for the event source and its target event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源和目標事件記錄檔的組態屬性。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: sourceData is .
trans-unit.target: sourceDatais .

trans-unit.source: Establishes the specified source name as a valid event source for writing entries to a log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的來源名稱做為有效的事件來源的項目寫入本機電腦上的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: This method can also create a new custom log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可以在本機電腦上建立新的自訂記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The source name by which the application is registered on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱，藉以在本機電腦註冊應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log the source's entries are written to.
trans-unit.target: 來源項目會寫入記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include Application, System, or a custom event log.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括應用程式、 系統或自訂的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 無法在本機電腦上開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.target: 建立指定的來源名稱做為有效的事件來源的項目寫入指定的電腦上的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: This method can also be used to create a new custom log on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也可用來指定電腦上建立新的自訂記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的電腦註冊應用程式的來源。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log the source's entries are written to.
trans-unit.target: 來源項目會寫入記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include Application, System, or a custom event log.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括應用程式、 系統或自訂的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value, `logName` defaults to Application.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定值，`logName`應用程式的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer to register this event source with, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊，這個事件來源電腦的名稱或 」。 「 本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 無法在指定的電腦上開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: Removes an event log from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 從本機電腦中移除事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Use this method when the log you want to delete is on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在本機電腦上您想要刪除的記錄檔時，請使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: You can delete any log on the computer, provided you have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以刪除任何記錄檔的電腦上，提供您有適當的登錄權限。

trans-unit.source: Delete removes the log specified by `logName` from the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Delete 會移除所指定的記錄檔`logName`從本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: If you want to delete only the source registered to a log, call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要刪除僅註冊記錄檔的來源，呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you only want to delete the log entries, call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Clear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想要刪除的記錄項目，呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Clear%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Delete and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A> are `static` methods, so they can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: 刪除和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>是`static`方法，因此您可以使用在本身的類別呼叫。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create a new instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call either method.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>呼叫這些方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The Delete method first deletes the file that holds the contents of the log.
trans-unit.target: Delete 方法會先刪除保留的記錄檔內容的檔案。

trans-unit.source: It then accesses the registry and removes all the event sources registered for that log.
trans-unit.target: 接著會存取登錄，並移除已註冊為該記錄檔的所有事件來源。

trans-unit.source: If you recreate the log at a later point, you should register the event sources again, if they are to be reused.
trans-unit.target: 如果您重新建立在稍後針對某個點的記錄，您應該註冊的事件來源同樣地，如果它們是可重複使用。

trans-unit.source: If you do not register the event sources and other users write to an event source without specifying a log name, the event source will be created in the Application event log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不會登錄事件來源，而且其他使用者撰寫，事件來源，而不指定記錄檔名稱，將應用程式事件記錄檔中建立事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, applications that previously were able to write entries to the log you deleted and recreated will write to the Application log instead, because it now contains the event source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，應用程式，先前能夠寫入您刪除並重新建立記錄檔中的項目會寫入應用程式記錄檔相反地，因為它現在包含事件來源。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Recreating an event log can be a difficult process.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 重新建立事件記錄檔可以很困難。

trans-unit.source: Avoid deleting any of the system-created event logs, such as the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 避免刪除任何系統建立的事件記錄檔，例如應用程式記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Deleting a log through a call to Delete automatically deletes the sources registered to that log.
trans-unit.target: 刪除記錄，以透過呼叫 Delete 會自動刪除該記錄檔登錄來源。

trans-unit.source: This can make other applications using that log inoperative.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓其他應用程式使用該記錄檔無法作業。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, and any custom event logs on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括︰ 應用程式、 安全性、 系統和任何自訂的事件記錄檔的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: DeleteEventSource accesses the registry on the local computer and removes the registration of your application as a valid source of events.
trans-unit.target: DeleteEventSource 存取本機電腦上的登錄，並移除您的應用程式做為有效的事件來源註冊。

trans-unit.source: You can remove your component as a valid source of events if you no longer need it to write entries to that log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不再需要寫入該記錄檔項目，您可以為有效的事件來源移除您的元件。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might do this if you need to change your component from one log to another.

trans-unit.source: Because a source can only be registered to one log at a time, changing the log requires you to remove the current registration.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>, and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"> </xref>，並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>參考。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> receives <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten"></xref> event notifications.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>接收<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten"></xref>事件通知。

trans-unit.source: The EnableRaisingEvents property determines whether the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> raises events when entries are written to the log.
trans-unit.target: EnableRaisingEvents 屬性會決定是否<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>會寫入記錄檔的項目時引發事件</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: When the property is `true`, components that receive the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event will receive notification any time an entry is written to the log that is specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若屬性是`true`，接收的元件<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件將會收到通知隨時將項目會寫入記錄檔中指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>

trans-unit.source: If EnableRaisingEvents is `false`, no events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 EnableRaisingEvents `false`，不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can receive event notifications only when entries are written on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 項目寫入本機電腦上時，才，可以接收事件通知。

trans-unit.source: You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您無法接收通知的遠端電腦上寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> receives notification when an entry is written to the log; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>時項目寫入記錄檔，否則會收到通知<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The event log is on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔是遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> used on a form or by another component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化結束<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>用於表單或另一個元件所使用。

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 初始化發生於執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component used on a form or by another component.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]設計環境會使用這個方法來結束初始化用於表單或另一個元件所使用的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>方法會啟動初始化。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>和 EndInit 方法可防止控制項完全初始化之前使用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄檔的內容。

trans-unit.source: Use the Entries member when reading from the event log.
trans-unit.target: 讀取事件記錄檔時，請使用項目成員。

trans-unit.source: Because the property is read-only, you cannot modify an entry or write to the log using Entries.
trans-unit.target: 因為屬性是唯讀，則您無法修改項目，或使用寫入記錄檔項目。

trans-unit.source: Instead, specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> and call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> to write a new log entry.
trans-unit.target: 請改為指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>寫入新的記錄檔項目。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use Entries to count the number of entries in the event log, and view each <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用來計算事件記錄檔中的項目數的項目，並檢視每個<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>集合中。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>

trans-unit.source: Use the indexed <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A> member to retrieve information about a specific entry, such as <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A>成員，才能擷取資訊的特定項目，例如<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Category%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> when only reading from a log.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>時只會讀取記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> name and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> (server computer name) properties for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以只指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>名稱和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>（伺服器電腦名稱） 的屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: In either case, the Entries member is automatically populated with the event log's list of entries.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情況下，系統會自動填入 項目成員的項目事件記錄檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: You can select the appropriate index for an item in this list to read individual entries.
trans-unit.target: 您可以讀取個別項目這份清單中選取適當的項目索引。

trans-unit.source: An important distinction between reading and writing log entries is that it is not necessary to explicitly call a read method.
trans-unit.target: 讀取和寫入記錄項目之間的一個重大差異是不需要明確地呼叫讀取的方法。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> are specified, the Entries property is automatically populated.
trans-unit.target: 之後<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>指定，會自動填入的項目屬性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> property, the Entries property is repopulated the next time you read it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>屬性，屬性重新讀取。 請在下一次擴展之後的項目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You are not required to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>您要連接到記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer, ".", is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本機電腦中，"。"，會假設。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection"></xref> holding the entries in the event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection"> </xref>項目保存事件記錄檔中。

trans-unit.source: Each entry is associated with an instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目是相關聯的執行個體<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an entry is written to an event log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 發生於項目寫入事件記錄檔在本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: To get event notifications, you must set <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得事件通知，您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>至`true`。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EnableRaisingEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can only receive event notifications when entries are written on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 項目寫入本機電腦上時，您只可以接收事件通知。

trans-unit.source: You cannot receive notifications for entries written on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 您無法接收通知的遠端電腦上寫入的項目。

trans-unit.source: When you create an EntryWritten delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的 EntryWritten 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每當事件發生時，直到您移除委派，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The system responds to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> only if the last write event occurred at least six seconds previously.
trans-unit.target: 系統會回應至<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>才發生至少六秒之前的最後一個寫入事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implies you will only receive one EntryWritten event notification within a six-second interval, even if more than one event log change occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這表示您只會接收一個六秒間隔內的 EntryWritten 事件通知，即使一個以上的事件記錄檔變更，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a sufficiently long sleep interval (around 10 seconds) between calls to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, you are less likely to miss an event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您插入夠長的睡眠狀態 （約 10 秒） 之間間隔呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，您不太可能會遺失事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if write events occur more frequently, you might not recieve the event notification until the next interval.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果寫入事件經常發生，您可能不會收到事件通知，直到下一個間隔。

trans-unit.source: Typically, missed event notifications are not lost, but delayed.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，遺失的事件通知不會遺失，但延遲。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the log exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 決定記錄檔是否存在於本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine if a log exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷本機電腦上是否有記錄檔中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a source exists on the local computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷來源是否存在於本機電腦上，，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, the query returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因此您必須為本機電腦上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，查詢會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new log the name of an existing log on the same computer, use this method before creating a new log to determine if the specified `logName` already exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法在相同電腦上讓新的記錄檔的現有記錄檔名稱，建立新的記錄檔之前先使用此方法來判斷是否指定`logName`已存在於本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: The `logName` parameter is not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `logName`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: Exists is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: 存在是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫此類別本身。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call Exists.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>呼叫 Exists。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The name of the log to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, other application-specific logs (such as those associated with Active Directory), or any custom log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括︰ 應用程式、 安全性、 系統、 其他應用程式特定的記錄檔 （例如 Active Directory 相關聯） 或在電腦上的任何自訂記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the log exists on the local computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果記錄檔是否位於本機電腦。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The logName is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: LogName 是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或值是空的。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the log exists on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 判斷記錄檔是否存在指定的電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine if a log exists on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷遠端電腦上是否有記錄檔中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a source exists on a remote computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷來源是否存在於遠端電腦上，，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the specified computer; otherwise, the query returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因此您必須為指定電腦上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，查詢會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new log the name of an existing log on the same computer, use this method before creating a new log to determine if one with the specified `logName` already exists on the server specified by the `machineName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法在相同電腦上讓新的記錄檔的現有記錄檔名稱，建立新的記錄檔之前使用這個方法來判斷是否有一個具有指定`logName`已存在於所指定的伺服器上`machineName`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `logName` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `logName`和`machineName`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫此類別本身。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create a new instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立新的執行個體的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The log for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Possible values include: Application, Security, System, other application-specific logs (such as those associated with Active Directory), or any custom log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值包括︰ 應用程式、 安全性、 系統、 其他應用程式特定的記錄檔 （例如 Active Directory 相關聯） 或在電腦上的任何自訂記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which to search for the log, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其上搜尋記錄檔中，電腦名稱或 」。 「 本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the log exists on the specified computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果記錄檔存在指定的電腦否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The machineName parameter is an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: machineName 參數是無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have used proper syntax for the computer on which you are searching.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您已使用正確的語法，您要搜尋之電腦。

trans-unit.source: -or- The logName is or the value is empty.
trans-unit.target: -或- logName 是或值是空的。

trans-unit.source: Searches for all event logs on the local computer and creates an array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> objects that contain the list.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋本機電腦上的所有事件記錄檔，並建立的陣列<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>包含清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the local computer when the call to GetEventLogs is made.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>物件時，才能在本機電腦上的所有事件記錄檔的快照集呼叫 GetEventLogs。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time.
trans-unit.target: 這不是動態的集合，所以不會反映的刪除或建立的即時記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it.
trans-unit.target: 您應該確認陣列中的記錄存在才能讀取或寫入其中。

trans-unit.source: The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常包括至少三個記錄檔︰ 應用程式、 系統及安全性。

trans-unit.source: If you created custom logs on the local computer, they will appear in the array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在本機電腦上建立的自訂記錄檔，它們會出現在陣列中。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的事件記錄檔清單，您必須使用適當的登錄權限。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are identical to those required to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些權限是相同的呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>所需

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> that represents the logs on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"> </xref> ，代表本機電腦上的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You do not have read access to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 登錄沒有讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is no event log service on the computer.
trans-unit.target: -或者-在電腦上沒有事件記錄檔服務。

trans-unit.source: Searches for all event logs on the given computer and creates an array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> objects that contain the list.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋指定的電腦上的所有事件記錄檔，並建立的陣列<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>包含清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: The array of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> objects is a snapshot of all event logs on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter when the call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is made.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>物件是所指定的電腦上的所有事件記錄檔的快照集`machineName`參數時呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>進行。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: This is not a dynamic collection, so it does not reflect the deletion or creation of logs in real time.
trans-unit.target: 這不是動態的集合，所以不會反映的刪除或建立的即時記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You should verify that a log in the array exists before you read or write to it.
trans-unit.target: 您應該確認陣列中的記錄存在才能讀取或寫入其中。

trans-unit.source: The array usually includes at least three logs: Application, System, and Security.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常包括至少三個記錄檔︰ 應用程式、 系統及安全性。

trans-unit.source: If you created custom logs on the specified computer, they will appear in the array as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的電腦上建立的自訂記錄檔，它們會出現在陣列中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>類別本身。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.GetEventLogs%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object to make a call to the method.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立的執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>物件，讓方法的呼叫。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the list of event logs, you must have the appropriate registry permissions.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取的事件記錄檔清單，您必須使用適當的登錄權限。

trans-unit.source: These permissions are identical to those required to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些權限是相同的呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>所需

trans-unit.source: The computer on which to search for event logs.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋事件記錄檔的電腦。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> that represents the logs on the given computer.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>表示指定的電腦上的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The machineName parameter is an invalid computer name.
trans-unit.target: machineName 參數是無效的電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: You do not have read access to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 登錄沒有讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is no event log service on the computer.
trans-unit.target: -或者-在電腦上沒有事件記錄檔服務。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the log to read from or write to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要讀取或寫入記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log.
trans-unit.target: 記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be Application, System, Security, or a custom log name.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是應用程式、 系統、 安全性或自訂的記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the event log's friendly name.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄檔的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In Windows Vista and later, users do not have permission to access the security log.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，使用者沒有存取安全性記錄檔的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are running Windows Vista or later as a user, you will get a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> when you attempt to access the display name for an event in the security log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您執行 Windows Vista 或更新版本的使用者身分，您會取得<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>當您嘗試存取安全性記錄檔中事件的顯示名稱</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista and later, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 和更新版本，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建的 Administrators 群組的成員，您就會指派兩個執行階段存取語彙基元︰ 標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼存取安全性記錄檔，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 當您啟動應用程式的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行時，您可以這樣做。

trans-unit.source: A name that represents the event log in the system's event viewer.
trans-unit.target: 代表系統的事件檢視器中的事件記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*> does not exist in the registry for this computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*>不存在於此電腦的登錄。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the log to which the specified source is registered.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定的來源註冊記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The event source indicates what logs the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源會指出項目會記錄事件。

trans-unit.source: It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是應用程式的名稱或名稱的子元件的應用程式，如果應用程式很大。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new source, which can only write to one log at a time, the system registers your application with the event log as a valid source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立新的來源，可以只撰寫一個記錄檔一次，則系統會登錄事件記錄檔與您的應用程式項目的有效來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property can be any string, but the name cannot be used by other sources on the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性可以是任何字串，但名稱不能在電腦上的其他來源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: An attempt to create a duplicated <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> value throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試建立重複的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>值擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, a single event log can have many different sources writing to it.
trans-unit.target: 不過，單一的事件記錄檔可以有許多不同的來源寫入。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer on which to look, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在其上搜尋，電腦名稱或 」。 「 本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log associated with the specified source in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在登錄中指定的來源相關聯的記錄檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the computer on which to read or write events.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來讀取或寫入事件之電腦的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you write to an event log, you must associate a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> with your event log object to connect it to a particular log.
trans-unit.target: 如果您寫入事件記錄檔時，您必須將<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>與您的事件記錄檔物件，來連接到特定的記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property when only reading from a log.
trans-unit.target: 不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性時只會讀取記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify only the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> name and MachineName (server computer name).
trans-unit.target: 您可以只指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>名稱和 MachineName （伺服器電腦名稱）。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You need not specify the MachineName if you are connecting to a log.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定 MachineName，如果您要連接到記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the MachineName, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定 MachineName，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。

trans-unit.source: A source can only be registered to one log at a time.
trans-unit.target: 一次只有一個記錄檔登錄來源。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property was set for an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>, you cannot change the MachineName property for that <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> without changing the value of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> or calling <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A> first.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>的執行個體已設定屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>，您無法變更的 MachineName 屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>而不需要變更的值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>或呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A>第一次。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.DeleteEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the MachineName property, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> closes all handles and reattaches to the log and source on the new computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將 MachineName 屬性中，變更<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>關閉所有控制代碼，並附加記錄檔和新的電腦上的來源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The MachineName value cannot be an empty string.
trans-unit.target: MachineName 值不可以是空的字串。

trans-unit.source: If it is not explicitly set, it defaults to the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 若未明確設定，則預設為本機電腦 ("。")。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server on which the event log resides.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔所在的伺服器名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is the local computer (".").
trans-unit.target: 預設值是本機電腦 ("。")。

trans-unit.source: The computer name is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 電腦名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum event log size in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定最大事件記錄檔大小，以 kb 為單位。

trans-unit.source: The MaximumKilobytes property represents the size limit of the event log file.
trans-unit.target: MaximumKilobytes 屬性代表的事件記錄檔的大小限制。

trans-unit.source: When the event log reaches the size limit, the configured <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> value determines whether new entries are discarded, or whether new entries overwrite older entries.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達大小限制，設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>值決定是否會捨棄新的項目，或新的項目是否覆寫較舊的項目。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性表示這個執行個體所代表的事件記錄檔的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達大小上限時，此屬性會指定作業系統如何處理新的項目寫入事件記錄檔已註冊的所有事件來源。

trans-unit.source: The maximum event log size in kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 最大事件記錄檔大小，以 kb 為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default is 512, indicating a maximum file size of 512 kilobytes.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 512，表示檔案大小上限為 512 kb。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is less than 64, or greater than 4194240, or not an even multiple of 64.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 64，或大於 4194240 或不 64 的偶數倍數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of days to retain entries in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件記錄檔中的項目的保留天數。

trans-unit.source: Use the MinimumRetentionDays property to examine the current setting for an event log.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的 MinimumRetentionDays 屬性來檢查事件記錄檔的目前設定。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> to change the minimum number of days that each entry in the event log must be retained.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>變更最小數目的事件記錄檔中的每個項目必須保留的天數。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The MinimumRetentionDays value depends on the configured overflow behavior of the event log.
trans-unit.target: MinimumRetentionDays 值取決於設定的溢位行為的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> property for an event log is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>, then the MinimumRetentionDays value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>事件記錄檔的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>，然後 MinimumRetentionDays 值為 0。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> </xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> property for an event log is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>, then the MinimumRetentionDays value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>事件記錄檔的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>，然後 MinimumRetentionDays 值為-1。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> </xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> property for an event log is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>, then the MinimumRetentionDays value is greater than zero, and represents the number of days to retain event log entries when the event log is full.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>事件記錄檔的屬性設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>，MinimumRetentionDays 值是小於或等於零，而且代表的事件記錄檔項目的事件記錄檔已滿時保留的天數。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> </xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior only occurs when an event log reaches its size limit.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔達到大小限制時，才會發生溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> has its <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>, and the event log reaches its maximum size, then new entries are written only if they can replace entries whose age exceeds the MinimumRetentionDays period.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>具有其<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>設<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>，和事件記錄檔達到大小上限，則新的項目寫入只可以取代其時間超過 MinimumRetentionDays 期間的項目。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: Retaining event entries for a minimum period is appropriate when the event log is archived regularly.
trans-unit.target: 保留的最小週期的事件項目時，適當的事件記錄檔會定期封存。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you risk losing new entries when the event log reaches its limit.
trans-unit.target: 否則，就可能會遺失事件記錄檔達到限制時的新項目。

trans-unit.source: To avoid losing new event information, set the minimum retention days for events based on your archive schedule for a particular event log.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免遺失新的事件資訊，請設定根據特定的事件記錄檔的封存排程事件的最小保留天數。

trans-unit.source: The number of days that entries in the event log are retained.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔中的項目所保留的天數。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 7.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 7。

trans-unit.source: Changes the configured behavior for writing new entries when the event log reaches its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 變更事件記錄檔達到檔案大小上限時寫入新的項目已設定的行為。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior for an event log specifies what happens when new entries are to be written to a log that has reached its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔的溢位行為會指定要寫入的記錄檔已達到其最大檔案大小，新的項目時，會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The overflow behavior takes effect only when an event log reaches its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 溢位行為在事件記錄檔達到檔案大小上限時，才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior does not affect writing a new entry to a log that can accommodate additional event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 溢位行為不會影響新的項目寫入記錄檔可容納額外的事件記錄項目。

trans-unit.source: The ModifyOverflowPolicy method configures the overflow behavior of an event log.
trans-unit.target: ModifyOverflowPolicy 方法設定事件記錄檔的溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: After calling this method for the event log specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> property values reflect the newly configured overflow behavior.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法所指定的事件記錄檔後<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A>屬性值會反映新設定的溢位行為。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MinimumRetentionDays%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.OverflowAction%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property represents a configuration setting for the event log represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性表示這個執行個體所代表的事件記錄檔的組態設定。

trans-unit.source: When the event log reaches its maximum size, this property specifies how the operating system handles new entries written by all event sources registered for the event log.
trans-unit.target: 當事件記錄檔到達大小上限時，此屬性會指定作業系統如何處理新的項目寫入事件記錄檔已註冊的所有事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Set the `action` parameter to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> to indicate that a new entry overwrites the oldest entry when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> reaches its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 設定`action`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>表示新項目會覆寫舊的項目時<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>達到最大值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: If the `action` parameter is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>, the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`action`參數設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>、`retentionDays`參數值會被忽略。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: Set the `action` parameter to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> to indicate that each new entry overwrites older entries when the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> reaches its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 設定`action`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>來表示，每個新的項目會覆寫舊的項目時<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>達到最大值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: Specify the number of days that events must be retained in the log using the `retentionDays` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 指定在記錄檔中使用的事件必須保留的天數`retentionDays`參數。

trans-unit.source: Events written within the retention range are not overwritten by new entries.
trans-unit.target: 新的項目不會覆寫的保留範圍內寫入的事件。

trans-unit.source: Set the `action` parameter to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> to discard new events when the maximum log size is reached.
trans-unit.target: 設定`action`參數<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>捨棄新的事件，當達到最大記錄檔大小。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: If the `action` parameter is set to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>, the `retentionDays` parameter value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果`action`參數設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>、`retentionDays`參數值會被忽略。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Setting the overflow policy to <xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction> specifies that new entries are discarded when the event log is full.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 將溢位原則設定為<xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>指定事件記錄檔已滿時，就會捨棄新的項目。</xref:System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction>

trans-unit.source: If you use this setting, ensure the event log is regularly archived and cleared to avoid reaching its maximum size limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用此設定，請確定事件記錄檔定期封存和清除，以避免達到其大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior for writing new entries to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 新的項目寫入事件記錄檔溢位行為。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of days each event log entry is retained.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件記錄檔項目會保留最少天數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is used only if `action` is set to <xref href="System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當使用這個參數`action`設<xref href="System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: action is not a valid value.
trans-unit.target: action不是有效值。

trans-unit.source: retentionDays is less than one, or larger than 365.
trans-unit.target: retentionDays小於 1，或大於 365。

trans-unit.source: Gets the configured behavior for storing new entries when the event log reaches its maximum log file size.
trans-unit.target: 取得當事件記錄檔到達最大記錄檔大小時，儲存新項目的已設定的行為。

trans-unit.source: Event logs grow in size as new events are written to them.
trans-unit.target: 在新的事件會寫入事件記錄檔大小變大。

trans-unit.source: Each event log has a configured maximum size limit; the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A> property defines the maximum number of kilobytes allowed for the event log file size.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件記錄檔已設定的最大大小的限制;<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A>屬性會定義事件記錄檔大小所允許的 kb 數目上限。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MaximumKilobytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OverflowAction property value to examine the configured overflow behavior for an event log at its maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查事件記錄檔，在其大小上限所設定的溢位的行為使用 OverflowAction 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A> method to change the overflow behavior for an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>方法來變更溢位行為的事件記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.ModifyOverflowPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The overflow behavior takes effect only when an event log reaches its maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 溢位行為在事件記錄檔達到檔案大小上限時，才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The overflow behavior does not affect writing a new entry to a log that can accommodate additional event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 溢位行為不會影響新的項目寫入記錄檔可容納額外的事件記錄項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction"></xref> value that specifies the configured behavior for storing new entries when the event log reaches its maximum log size.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction"> </xref>值，指定當事件記錄檔到達最大記錄檔大小時，儲存新項目的已設定的行為。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Diagnostics.OverflowAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the localized name of the event log, which is displayed in the server Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 指定事件記錄檔，它會顯示在伺服器事件檢視器的當地語系化的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Use RegisterDisplayName to register and display a localized name in the Event Viewer for custom event logs.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RegisterDisplayName 登錄和自訂事件記錄檔的事件檢視器中顯示的當地語系化的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The specified resource identifier must correspond to a localized string defined in the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資源識別碼必須對應到資源檔中定義的當地語系化字串。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the custom event log name using the localized string and the current culture settings.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示使用當地語系化的字串和目前的文化特性設定的自訂事件記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can define multiple event log names localized for different cultures in your resource file.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以定義多個資源檔中的不同文化特性的當地語系化的事件記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the localized string corresponding to the culture settings of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示對應到目前使用者的文化特性設定當地語系化的字串。

trans-unit.source: If the Event Viewer cannot load the localized string from the resource file, or if no display name was registered for the event log, then the Event Viewer displays the event log name defined in <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件檢視器無法從資源檔，載入當地語系化的字串，或如果沒有顯示名稱已註冊的事件記錄檔，事件檢視器顯示<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>中定義的事件記錄檔名稱

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You do not need to register a display name for the pre-defined event logs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您不需要註冊預先定義的事件記錄檔的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The operating system registers the localized display names for the Application, System, and Security event logs.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統會註冊應用程式、 系統及安全性事件記錄檔的當地語系化的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully specified path to a localized resource file.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的資源檔案的完整指定的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The resource identifier that indexes a localized string within the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 索引內的資源檔的當地語系化的字串資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: resourceFile is .
trans-unit.target: resourceFile is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source name to register and use when writing to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定寫入事件記錄檔時登錄和使用的來源名稱。

trans-unit.source: The event source indicates what logs the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源會指出項目會記錄事件。

trans-unit.source: It is often the name of the application, or the name of a subcomponent of the application, if the application is large.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是應用程式的名稱或名稱的子元件的應用程式，如果應用程式很大。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式和服務應該寫入應用程式記錄檔或自訂的記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 裝置驅動程式應該寫入至系統記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: You only need to specify an event source if you are writing to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 您只需要指定事件來源，如果您要撰寫事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Before writing an entry to an event log, you must register the event source with the event log as a valid source of events.
trans-unit.target: 之前將項目寫入事件記錄檔，您必須與事件記錄檔登錄事件來源為有效的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: When you write a log entry, the system uses the Source property to find the appropriate log in which to place your entry.
trans-unit.target: 當您撰寫的記錄項目時，系統會使用 [來源] 屬性來尋找適當的記錄檔中要放置您的項目。

trans-unit.source: If you are reading the event log, you can either specify the Source, or a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在閱讀事件記錄檔，您可以指定來源，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You are not required to specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> if you are connecting to a log on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您不需要指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如果您要連接至本機電腦上的記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>
