trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> to write events to an event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>寫入事件記錄檔的事件</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify an event source to write events; you must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指定事件來源寫入事件。您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event source for an existing event log or a new event log.
trans-unit.target: 您可以建立現有的事件記錄檔或新的事件記錄檔事件來源。

trans-unit.source: When you create a new source for a new event log, the system registers the source for that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立新的事件記錄檔的新來源時，系統會註冊為該記錄檔中，來源，但寫入第一個項目之前，不會建立記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The source must be unique on the local computer; a new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name.
trans-unit.target: 來源必須為本機電腦上唯一新的來源名稱不符合現有的來源名稱或現有的事件記錄檔名稱。

trans-unit.source: Each source can write to only one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 只有一個事件記錄檔可以寫入每個來源一次。不過，您的應用程式可以使用多個來源來寫入多個事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您的應用程式可能需要多個來源設定為不同的事件記錄檔或不同的資源檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you change the Source value, the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to which it is registered is closed and all event handles are released.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更來源值<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>來登錄它已關閉，且會釋放所有的事件控制代碼。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the configuration details of an existing source, you must delete the source and then create it with the new configuration.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更現有來源的設定詳細資料，您必須刪除來源，並再建立使用新的設定。

trans-unit.source: If other applications or components use the existing source, create a new source with the updated configuration rather than deleting the existing source.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他應用程式或元件使用現有的來源，請使用更新的組態，而不會刪除現有的來源建立新的來源。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a source has already been mapped to a log and you remap it to a new log, you must restart the computer for the changes to take effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果來源已經對應到記錄檔，而且對應至新的記錄檔，您必須重新啟動電腦，變更才會生效。

trans-unit.source: The name registered with the event log as a source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 事件記錄檔與登錄項目的來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The source name results in a registry key path longer than 254 characters.
trans-unit.target: 來源名稱會導致超過 254 個字元的登錄機碼路徑。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event source is registered on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要將事件來源登錄在本機電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷事件來源是否存在於本機電腦上使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a log exists on the local computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷本機電腦上是否有記錄，，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the local computer; otherwise, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因此您必須為本機電腦上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 若要搜尋的事件來源在 Windows Vista 和更新版本或 Windows Server 2003，您必須具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: > > The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: >> 這項需求的原因是，必須搜尋所有的事件記錄檔，包括安全性、 以判斷事件來源是否為唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者沒有權限來存取安全性記錄檔中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > > Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建的 Administrators 群組的成員，您就會指派兩個執行階段存取語彙基元︰ 標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 當您啟動應用程式的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行時，您可以這樣做。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A service that is executing under the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount> account does not have the privileges required to execute this method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 下執行時的服務<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount>帳戶沒有執行這個方法所需的權限。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount>

trans-unit.source: The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>, and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer.
trans-unit.target: 解決方法是檢查 事件來源是否存在於<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>，而且如果它不存在，安裝程式中建立的來源。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法讓新的來源的同一部電腦上現有的來源名稱，然後再嘗試使用這個方法來呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>，確保來源所指定的名稱與`source`不存在本機電腦上。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `source` parameter is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `source`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event source is registered on the local computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件來源註冊為本機電腦上，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: source was not found, but some or all of the event logs could not be searched.
trans-unit.target: source找不到，但無法搜尋部分或全部的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an event source is registered on a specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的電腦上是否已註冊的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether an event source exists on the computer specified by the `machineName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來判斷所指定的電腦上是否有事件來源`machineName`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether a log exists on the specified computer, use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要判斷記錄檔是否存在指定的電腦上，，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Exists%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this method accesses the registry, you must have the appropriate registry permissions on the given server; otherwise, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會存取登錄，因為您必須指定伺服器上擁有適當的登錄權限否則，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To search for an event source in Windows Vista and later or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 若要搜尋的事件來源在 Windows Vista 和更新版本或 Windows Server 2003，您必須具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: > > The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: >> 這項需求的原因是，必須搜尋所有的事件記錄檔，包括安全性、 以判斷事件來源是否為唯一。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者沒有權限來存取安全性記錄檔中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > > Starting with Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 從 Windows Vista 開始，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是內建的 Administrators 群組的成員，您就會指派兩個執行階段存取語彙基元︰ 標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 當您啟動應用程式的應用程式圖示上按一下滑鼠右鍵，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行時，您可以這樣做。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A service that is executing under the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount> account does not have the privileges required to execute this method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 下執行時的服務<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount>帳戶沒有執行這個方法所需的權限。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceAccount>

trans-unit.source: The solution is to check whether the event source exists in the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>, and if it does not exist, to create the source in the installer.
trans-unit.target: 解決方法是檢查 事件來源是否存在於<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>，而且如果它不存在，安裝程式中建立的來源。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Because you cannot give a new source the name of an existing source on the same computer, use this method before attempting to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> to ensure that a source with the name specified by `source` does not already exist on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 因為您無法讓新的來源的同一部電腦上現有的來源名稱，然後再嘗試使用這個方法來呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>，確保來源所指定的名稱與`source`不存在電腦上。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `source` and `machineName` parameters are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `source`和`machineName`參數不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A> is a `static` method, so it can be called on the class itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>是`static`方法，所以它可以呼叫此類別本身。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create an instance of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> to call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不需要建立<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.SourceExists%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: The name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件來源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name the computer on which to look, or "." for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 名稱的電腦上尋找，或 」。 「 本機電腦。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event source is registered on the given computer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果事件來源註冊指定的電腦。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: machineName is an invalid computer name.
trans-unit.target: machineName這是不正確的電腦名稱。

trans-unit.source: source was not found, but some or all of the event logs could not be searched.
trans-unit.target: source找不到，但無法搜尋部分或全部的事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used to marshal the event handler calls issued as a result of an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> entry written event.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定物件，用以封送處理的事件處理常式呼叫<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>項目寫入事件。

trans-unit.source: When SynchronizingObject is `null`, methods handling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event are called on a thread from the system thread pool.
trans-unit.target: SynchronizingObject 時`null`，方法處理<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>系統執行緒集區的執行緒上呼叫事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>

trans-unit.source: For more information on system thread pools, see <xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關系統執行緒集區的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>.</xref:System.Threading.ThreadPool>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event is handled by a visual Windows Forms component, such as a button, accessing the component through the system thread pool might not work, or might result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>事件由 visual 的 Windows Form 的元件，例如按鈕，存取元件，透過系統執行緒集區可能無法運作，或可能會導致例外狀況處理。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>

trans-unit.source: Avoid this by setting SynchronizingObject to a Windows Forms component, which causes the methods handling the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten> event to be called on the same thread on which the component was created.
trans-unit.target: 避免這種藉由設定至 Windows Form 的元件，這會導致處理方法 SynchronizingObject<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>元件建立所在的相同執行緒上呼叫的事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> is used inside [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in a Windows Forms designer, SynchronizingObject is automatically set to the control containing the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>內使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]在 Windows Form 設計工具中，SynchronizingObject 會自動設定為包含<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you place an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> on a designer for Form1 (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) the SynchronizingObject property of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> is set to the instance of Form1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您將<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>form1 設計工具上 (繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) 的 SynchronizingObject 屬性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>設為 Form1 的執行個體。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> used to marshal event-handler calls issued as a result of an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten"></xref> event on the event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref>用來封送處理發出的事件處理常式呼叫<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog.EntryWritten"></xref>事件記錄檔的事件。

trans-unit.source: Writes an information type entry, with the given message text, to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的訊息文字的資訊類型項目寫入事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an information entry to the event log associated with this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來寫入事件記錄檔與此相關聯的資訊項目<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify any other <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>, use a different overload of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要指定任何其他已設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>，請使用不同的多載的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before you can write entries to the log.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>您的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>元件，您才能寫入記錄檔項目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>上的屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: If the source specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> and registers the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定來源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>寫入您的元件，在電腦上未註冊執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>並註冊來源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> for your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance before you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如您<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體，才能呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the system needs to register the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property has not been set on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance, the log defaults to the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 系統是否需要<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>透過呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>而且<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>未在您的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體，預設為應用程式記錄檔的記錄檔</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>設定屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>的</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>註冊

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Many of the exceptions listed above are generated by errors raised during the process of registering the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 註冊<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>的程序期間引發的錯誤時會產生許多上面所列的例外狀況

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法事件記錄檔中直接寫入指定的字串; 它不會使用可當地語系化的訊息資源檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法，以使用當地語系化的訊息資源檔寫入事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 項目寫入遠端的電腦上，如果訊息 （文字字串） 的值可能不會不如預期如果遠端電腦未執行.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`參數包含 NUL 字元，則 NUL 字元在終止事件記錄檔中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入事件記錄檔的字串。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件項目寫入事件記錄檔時，作業系統回報錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Windows 錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Writes an error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit entry with the given message text to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 寫入事件記錄檔的錯誤、 警告、 資訊、 成功稽核或失敗稽核項目，以指定的訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry of a specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來撰寫的指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>事件記錄檔</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>項目

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before you can write entries to the log.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>您的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>元件，您才能寫入記錄檔項目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>上的屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: If the source specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> and registers the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定來源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>寫入您的元件，在電腦上未註冊執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>並註冊來源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> for your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance before you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如您<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體，才能呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the system needs to register the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property has not been set on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance, the log defaults to the Application log.

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法事件記錄檔中直接寫入指定的字串; 它不會使用可當地語系化的訊息資源檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法，以使用當地語系化的訊息資源檔寫入事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the message (the text string) might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 項目寫入遠端的電腦上，如果訊息 （文字字串） 的值可能不會不如預期如果遠端電腦未執行.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`參數包含 NUL 字元，則 NUL 字元在終止事件記錄檔中的訊息。

trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`參數包含 NUL 字元，則 NUL 字元在終止事件記錄檔中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: > > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: >>`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的電腦註冊應用程式的來源。

trans-unit.source: Writes an entry with the given message text and application-defined event identifier to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的訊息文字和應用程式定義的事件識別項的項目寫入事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry with an application-defined `eventID` to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來撰寫應用程式定義的項目`eventID`事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The `eventID` together with the source uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: `eventID`來源一起唯一識別的事件。

trans-unit.source: Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式可以定義自己的編號的事件和它們所對應的描述字串。

trans-unit.source: Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示這些字串值，以協助使用者瞭解何處出錯，並建議要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會指出事件類型是錯誤、 警告、 資訊、 成功稽核或失敗稽核。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: type is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: type不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件項目寫入事件記錄檔時，作業系統回報錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Windows 錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Writes an error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit entry with the given message text to the event log, using the specified registered event source.
trans-unit.target: 寫入事件記錄檔，使用指定的登錄的事件來源的錯誤、 警告、 資訊、 成功稽核或失敗稽核項目，以指定的訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry of a specified <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來寫入<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>事件記錄檔中，使用 已註冊適當的記錄檔事件來源為來源</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>指定的項目

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法事件記錄檔中直接寫入指定的字串; 它不會使用可當地語系化的訊息資源檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法，以使用當地語系化的訊息資源檔寫入事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`參數包含 NUL 字元，則 NUL 字元在終止事件記錄檔中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的電腦註冊應用程式的來源。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入事件記錄檔的字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Windows 錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Writes an entry with the given message text, application-defined event identifier, and application-defined category to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的訊息文字、 應用程式定義的事件識別項和應用程式定義的分類的項目寫入事件記錄檔中。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write an entry with an application-defined `category` to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來撰寫應用程式定義的項目`category`事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用要寫入的事件來源的篩選事件的類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或它可以使用 「 類別目錄做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `category` parameter should be a positive value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`category`參數應該是正值。

trans-unit.source: Negative category values appear as a complementary positive number in the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 負的類別值會顯示為互補的正數在事件檢視器。

trans-unit.source: For example, a –10 appears as 65,526, a –1 as 65,535.
> [!NOTE] > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the `category` to a resource identifier in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定`category`類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified `category` does not index a string in the category resource file, then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定`category`未索引的字串，在類別資源檔案中，事件檢視器會顯示該項目的數值分類值。

trans-unit.source: Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定類別資源檔案，以及使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>類別</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>資源檔案中中的類別字串的數目

trans-unit.source: In addition to the category, you can specify an event identifier for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 除了類別目錄中，您可以指定要寫入事件記錄檔事件的事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: Event identifiers, along with the event source, uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的識別項，以及事件來源，可唯一識別事件。

trans-unit.source: Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式可以定義自己的編號的事件和它們所對應的描述字串。

trans-unit.source: Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示這些字串值，以協助使用者瞭解何處出錯，並建議要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can specify an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 最後，您可以指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>事件寫入事件記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit.

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before you can write entries to the log.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>您的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>元件，您才能寫入記錄檔項目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>上的屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.

trans-unit.source: If the source specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> and registers the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果在指定來源<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>寫入您的元件，在電腦上未註冊執行個體<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>並註冊來源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify a <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A> for your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance before you call <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>, the local computer (".") is assumed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>如您<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>執行個體，才能呼叫<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>，本機電腦 ("。") 會假設。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.MachineName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the system needs to register the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> through a call to <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property has not been set on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance, the log defaults to the Application log.

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the event identifier, this overload of <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> lets you specify an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 除了事件識別項，<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>可讓您指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>事件寫入事件記錄檔</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>的這個多載

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會指出事件類型是錯誤、 警告、 資訊、 成功稽核或失敗稽核。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法事件記錄檔中直接寫入指定的字串; 它不會使用可當地語系化的訊息資源檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法，以使用當地語系化的訊息資源檔寫入事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`參數包含 NUL 字元，則 NUL 字元在終止事件記錄檔中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的電腦註冊應用程式的來源。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入事件記錄檔的字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The application-specific identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式特定事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: type is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: type不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件項目寫入事件記錄檔時，作業系統回報錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Windows 錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Writes an entry with the given message text, application-defined event identifier, and application-defined category to the event log, and appends binary data to the message.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的訊息文字、 應用程式定義的事件識別項和應用程式定義的分類的項目寫入事件記錄檔，並將二進位資料附加至訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to write application-defined event-specific data to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用此多載將應用程式定義的事件特定資料寫入事件記錄檔。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer does not interpret this data; it displays raw data only in a combined hexadecimal and text format.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器不會解譯這項資料。它只能在組合的十六進位和文字格式顯示未經處理資料。

trans-unit.source: Use event-specific data sparingly, including it only if you are sure it will be useful to someone debugging the problem.
trans-unit.target: 使用事件的特定資料謹慎使用，包括它只有在確定會很有用給偵錯問題。

trans-unit.source: You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用特定的事件資料來儲存應用程式可以處理與事件檢視器無關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could write a viewer specifically for your events, or write a program that scans the logfile and creates reports that include information from the event-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以編寫特別為您的事件檢視器，或編寫程式，以掃描記錄檔，並建立報告，其中包含從特定的事件資料的資訊。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the binary data, you can specify an application-defined category and an application-defined event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 除了二進位資料，您可以指定應用程式定義的類別目錄和應用程式定義的事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用要寫入的事件來源的篩選事件的類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或它可以使用 「 類別目錄做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `category` parameter should be a positive value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`category`參數應該是正值。

trans-unit.source: Negative category values appear as a complementary positive number in the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 負的類別值會顯示為互補的正數在事件檢視器。

trans-unit.source: For example, a –10 appears as 65,526, a –1 as 65,535.

To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the `category` to a resource identifier in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定`category`類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified `category` does not index a string in the category resource file, then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定`category`未索引的字串，在類別資源檔案中，事件檢視器會顯示該項目的數值分類值。

trans-unit.source: Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定類別資源檔案，以及使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>類別</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>資源檔案中中的類別字串的數目

trans-unit.source: Event identifiers, along with the event source, uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的識別項，以及事件來源，可唯一識別事件。

trans-unit.source: Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式可以定義自己的編號的事件和它們所對應的描述字串。

trans-unit.source: Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示這些字串值，以協助使用者瞭解何處出錯，並建議要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can specify an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 最後，您可以指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>事件寫入事件記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>

trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>您的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>元件，您才能寫入記錄檔項目</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>上的屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: If the source specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property of this <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> instance is not registered on the computer that your component is writing to, <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> calls <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> and registers the source.

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器可以顯示類別目錄做為數值，或它可以使用 「 類別目錄做為資源識別項若要顯示的當地語系化類別目錄字串。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `category` parameter should be a positive value.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`category`參數應該是正值。

trans-unit.source: Negative category values appear as a complementary positive number in the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 負的類別值會顯示為互補的正數在事件檢視器。

trans-unit.source: For example, a –10 appears as 65,526, a –1 as 65,535.

To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the `category` to a resource identifier in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示事件檢視器中的當地語系化類別目錄字串，您必須使用事件來源類別資源檔案後，設定和設定`category`類別資源檔案中的資源識別項。

trans-unit.source: If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified `category` does not index a string in the category resource file, then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件來源沒有已設定的類別資源檔案，或指定`category`未索引的字串，在類別資源檔案中，事件檢視器會顯示該項目的數值分類值。

trans-unit.source: Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> or the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定類別資源檔案，以及使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>或<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData>類別</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSourceCreationData></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>資源檔案中中的類別字串的數目

trans-unit.source: In addition to the category, you can specify an event identifier for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 除了類別目錄中，您可以指定要寫入事件記錄檔事件的事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: Event identifiers, along with the event source, uniquely identify an event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的識別項，以及事件來源，可唯一識別事件。

trans-unit.source: Each application can define its own numbered events and the description strings to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式可以定義自己的編號的事件和它們所對應的描述字串。

trans-unit.source: Event viewers display these string values to help the user understand what went wrong and suggest what actions to take.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會顯示這些字串值，以協助使用者瞭解何處出錯，並建議要採取的動作。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can specify an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the event being written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 最後，您可以指定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>事件寫入事件記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>

trans-unit.source: The `type` is indicated by an icon and text in the Type column in the Event Viewer for a log.
trans-unit.target: `type`由圖示和記錄檔的事件檢視器的類型資料行中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates whether the event type is error, warning, information, success audit, or failure audit.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會指出事件類型是錯誤、 警告、 資訊、 成功稽核或失敗稽核。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method writes the given string directly to the event log; it does not use a localizable message resource file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法事件記錄檔中直接寫入指定的字串; 它不會使用可當地語系化的訊息資源檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write events using a localized message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法，以使用當地語系化的訊息資源檔寫入事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `message` parameter contains a NUL character, the message in the event log is terminated at the NUL character.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果`message`參數包含 NUL 字元，則 NUL 字元在終止事件記錄檔中的訊息。

trans-unit.source: > > The `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: >>`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: The source by which the application is registered on the specified computer.
trans-unit.target: 依據指定的電腦註冊應用程式的來源。

trans-unit.source: The string to write to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入事件記錄檔的字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The application-specific identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式特定事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: The application-specific subcategory associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 與訊息相關聯應用程式特定的子類別。

trans-unit.source: The registry key for the event log could not be opened.
trans-unit.target: 無法開啟事件記錄檔的登錄機碼。

trans-unit.source: type is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: type不是有效 。

trans-unit.source: The operating system reported an error when writing the event entry to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件項目寫入事件記錄檔時，作業系統回報錯誤。

trans-unit.source: A Windows error code is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用 Windows 錯誤程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Writes an entry with the given message text, application-defined event identifier, and application-defined category to the event log (using the specified registered event source) and appends binary data to the message.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定的訊息文字、 應用程式定義的事件識別項和應用程式定義的分類的項目寫入事件記錄檔 （使用指定的登錄的事件來源），並將二進位資料附加至訊息。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write application-defined event-specific data to the event log, using a source already registered as an event source for the appropriate log.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，將應用程式定義的事件特定資料寫入事件記錄檔，使用已登錄為適當的記錄檔事件來源的來源。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer does not interpret this data; it displays raw data only in a combined hexadecimal and text format.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器不會解譯這項資料。它只能在組合的十六進位和文字格式顯示未經處理資料。

trans-unit.source: Use event-specific data sparingly; include it only if you are sure it will be useful.
trans-unit.target: 謹慎使用; 使用特定的事件資料包含只有在確定會很有用。

trans-unit.source: You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用特定的事件資料來儲存應用程式可以處理與事件檢視器無關的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could write a viewer specifically for your events, or write a program that scans the logfile and creates reports that include information from the event-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以編寫特別為您的事件檢視器，或編寫程式，以掃描記錄檔，並建立報告，其中包含從特定的事件資料的資訊。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the binary data, you can specify an application-defined category and an application-defined event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 除了二進位資料，您可以指定應用程式定義的類別目錄和應用程式定義的事件識別項。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器會使用要寫入的事件來源的篩選事件的類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> of the `instance` input for the defined message in the source message resource file.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> of the `instance` input to define the category and event type of your event entry.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>的`instance`來定義您的事件項目分類和事件類型的輸入。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also specify an array of language-independent strings to insert into the localized message text.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以指定要插入當地語系化的訊息文字的語言無關字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: Set `values` to `null` if the event message does not contain formatting placeholders for replacement strings.
trans-unit.target: 設定`values`至`null`如果事件訊息未包含的取代字串格式化預留位置。

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> property on your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> component before using <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>您的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>元件之前使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A></xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>屬性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The specified source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log; the source must at minimum have a message resource file defined.
trans-unit.target: 指定的來源必須設定當地語系化的項目寫入記錄檔。來源最小值必須已定義的訊息資源檔。

trans-unit.source: You must create and configure the event source before writing the first entry with the source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立並設定事件來源寫入來源的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: Create the new event source during the installation of your application.
trans-unit.target: 在您的應用程式的安裝期間建立新的事件來源。

trans-unit.source: This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓作業系統重新整理其已註冊的事件來源的清單和其設定的時間。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業系統不重新整理其事件來源的清單，而且您嘗試寫入的事件，該新的來源寫入作業將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: You can configure a new source using an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>, or using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定新的來源使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>，或使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.CreateEventSource%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source.
trans-unit.target: 您必須建立新的事件來源電腦上具有系統管理權限。

trans-unit.source: The source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 必須設定來源，寫入當地語系化的項目或寫入直接的字串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method if your application writes string values directly to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，如果您的應用程式寫入的字串值，直接以事件記錄檔。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes entries using both resource identifiers and string values, you must register two separate sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式將使用的資源識別元和字串值的項目寫入，您必須註冊兩個不同的來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, configure one source with resource files, and then use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write entries using resource identifiers to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 例如，設定一個來源的資源檔，然後使用 該<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法來寫入項目使用事件記錄檔的資源識別項</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>中的來源

trans-unit.source: Then create a different source without resource files, and use that source in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> method to write strings directly to the event log using that source.
trans-unit.target: 然後建立不同的來源，如果沒有資源檔，並使用該來源中的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，將使用該來源的事件記錄檔中直接寫入字串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you write an entry to a remote computer, the value of the `message` string might not be what you expect if the remote computer is not running the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您將項目寫入遠端電腦時，值`message`字串可能不是您預期如果遠端電腦未執行.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: Also, the `message` string cannot contain %*n*, where *n* is an integer value (for example, %1), because the event viewer treats it as an insertion string.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`message`字串不能包含 %*n*，其中*n*是整數值 (例如，%1)，因為事件檢視器會將它視為插入字串。

trans-unit.source: Because an Internet Protocol, version 6 (IPv6) address can contain this character sequence, you cannot log an event message that contains an IPv6 address.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路 」 通訊協定版本 6 (IPv6) 位址都可以包含這個字元順序，因為無法記錄包含一個 IPv6 位址的事件訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specify binary data with an event when it is necessary to provide additional details for the event.
trans-unit.target: 指定二進位資料時必須提供其他詳細資料事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the `data` parameter to include information on a specific error.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用`data`參數來包含特定錯誤的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer does not interpret the associated event data; it displays the data in a combined hexadecimal and text format.
trans-unit.target: 事件檢視器不會解譯相關聯的事件資料。它會顯示資料組合的十六進位和文字格式。

trans-unit.source: Use event-specific data sparingly; include it only if you are sure it will be useful.
trans-unit.target: 謹慎使用; 使用特定的事件資料包含只有在確定會很有用。

trans-unit.source: You can also use event-specific data to store information the application can process independently of the Event Viewer.
